menu.description: Tender chicken cooked in a rich, creamy tomato-based sauce.
Grilled chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, served with mint chutney.
Fresh spinach and cottage cheese cooked in a flavorful blend of spices.
Fragrant basmati rice cooked with succulent chicken and aromatic spices.
Crispy rice and lentil crepe served with spiced potato filling and chutney.
Spiced chickpea curry served with deep-fried bread.
Skewered cottage cheese and vegetables grilled to perfection.
Creamy black lentils slow-cooked with butter and spices.
Deep-fried milk dumplings soaked in rose-flavored syrup.
Tender chicken tikka cooked in a spiced tomato and cream sauce.
Potatoes and cauliflower cooked with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
Soft and fluffy Indian bread baked in a clay oven.
Crispy hollow puris filled with spiced water, tamarind chutney, and chickpeas.
Slow-cooked lamb curry with aromatic spices.
Fragrant basmati rice cooked with mixed vegetables and spices.
Refreshing yogurt-based drink with sweet mango flavor.
Tender chicken cooked in a creamy cashew nut and yogurt sauce.
Crispy pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas.
Soft cottage cheese dumplings soaked in sweetened milk.
Juicy prawns cooked in a flavorful coconut and tomato-based curry.
